ingredients.ingredient: 1 pound large shrimp - peeled and deveined
1 red bell pepper, cut into 1 inch pieces
1 green bell pepper, cut into 1 inch pieces
1 fresh pineapple - peeled, cored and cut into wedges

cookingTips: Soak wooden skewers in water for 30 minutes before threading to prevent burning
Marinate seafood separately from vegetables to control cooking times properly
Alternate seafood with vegetables and pineapple, leaving small gaps for heat circulation
enrichment.coachingPrompt: These colorful kabobs combine sweet pineapple, savory seafood, and an Asian-inspired glaze. Help the user master threading technique and timing so everything cooks evenly without charring.
